Description

Established in 2014, Lozange Lab is an indie developer studio based in Metz, France, consisting of Ava and Mat, a husband and wife team who delicately craft indie games and interactive installations with love and passion.

Projects

  • Rip Them Off
  • Shuttle Shuffle: Aliens Panic
  • Swim Out
  • The Unic

Awards & Recognition

  • "Pocket Gamers Awards 2021" Rip Them Off finalist most innovative game of the year
  • "TIGA Games Industry Awards 2020" Rip Them Off finalist for best puzzle game + best strategy game
  • "GDC Summer 2020" Swim Out + Rip Them Off artworks selected at GDC Artists gallery
  • "International Mobile Game Awards 2020" The Unic finalist
  • "TIGA Games Industry Awards 2018" Swim Out finalist for Creativity Award + Best Strategy Game, London, Nov. 2019
  • "Indie Prize Europe 2018" Swim Out finalist at Casual Connect London, May 2018
  • "Ping Awards 2017" Swim Out finalist for Best Mobile Game, Paris, Oct. 2019
  • "TIGA Games Industry Awards 2017" Swim Out finalist for Best Puzzle Game, London, Nov. 2018
  • "Indie Prize Europe 2015" Shuttle Shuffle finalist at Casual Connect Amsterdam, Feb. 2015
  • "Game Art Exhibition" Shuttle Shuffle artwork exposed at Musée Fabre, Montpellier, France from Nov. 19 2014 to Jan. 2015
